description.en:
this page is about the complete version. So ***Uwasa no Shitarou-kun*** and ***Uwasa no Shitarou-kun Returns!*** don't get their own page.

Shitarou-kun originates from an one-shot that was published in ***SISTER***, later turned into a series. Horror and morbid comedy.

biography.en:
**Birth:** Sep 5, 1960
**Age:** 64
**Gender:** Male
**Debut Pen Name:** Yamamoto Kazuto (山本和都)

Senno Knife (千之ナイフ) is a talented manga-ka who debuted with Yukihime (Snow Princess) published in 1981 in Comic Lemon People #1 (Cover Date: 1982.02.01... It hit the shops around 15 December 1981) on pages 179-186. Since then he has created a fairly large variety of stories in a multitude of genres. Two genres that he shines in are adult manga and horror, and as of late, he's been doing much more in the horror genre. Formerly an assistant of [Matsumoto Leiji](https://mangadex.org/author/be228b76-d5cf-46ff-9b64-38c1a012574d/matsumoto-leiji), He is married to mangaka/musician [Nekoi Rutoto (猫井るとと)](https://mangadex.org/author/cb5164bc-e34c-415b-a447-089c0b36d808/nekoi-rutoto).

(Source: MU)

**Trackers:** 

- [AniList](https://anilist.co/staff/99382/Senno-Knife) 
- [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/author/00b73tv/senno-knife) 
- [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/people/4382/Senno_Knife)
